examples.example: 在人生的道路上，我们会遇到多少困难，但都要保持乐观积极的心态去面对。

translate.english: On the road of life, we will encounter many difficulties, but we all have to keep an optimistic and positive attitude to face them.

examples.example: 无论经历了多少风雨，我们都要坚定地朝着梦想前进。

translate.english: No matter how many storms we have experienced, we should firmly move forward towards the dream.

examples.example: 不管经历了多少挫折，我们都要勇往直前，永不放弃。

translate.english: No matter how many setbacks we have experienced, we should move forward bravely and never give up.
